"TheBatchDaileypaymentPymnt_sgmsgm_Nm" ,"TheBatchDaileypaymentacd"."AcademicYear" "TheBatchDaileypaymentacdAcademicYear" ,"TheBatchDaileypaymentacdGlFinperiod"."Fin_period_info" "TheBatchDaileypaymentacdGlFinperiodFin_period_info" ,"TheBatchDaileypaymentbranch"."Desc1" "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchDesc1" ,"TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchsgm"."sgm_Nm" "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchsgmsgm_Nm" ,"TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchGender"."Gender" "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchGenderGender" ,"TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchstage"."ShortDesc1" "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchstageShortDesc1" ,"TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchschtyp"."schtypDesc" "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchschtypschtypDesc" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."branch" "branch" ,"Thebranch"."Desc1" "ThebranchDesc1" ,"Thebranchsgm"."sgm_Nm" "Thebranchsgmsgm_Nm" ,"ThebranchsgmOpco"."OpcoName" "ThebranchsgmOpcoOpcoName" ,"ThebranchGender"."Gender" "ThebranchGenderGender" ,"Thebranchstage"."ShortDesc1" "ThebranchstageShortDesc1" ,"Thebranchschtyp"."schtypDesc" "ThebranchschtypschtypDesc" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."itmiD" "itmiD" ,"itm"."itmDescription" "itmitmDescription" ,"itmitmacc_"."Acc_Nm" "itmitmacc_Acc_Nm" ,"itmitmacc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Nm" "itmitmacc_Clsacc_Acc_Nm" ,"itmitmacc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Nm" "itmitmacc_Acc_BndAcc_Nm" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."cstyp_NO" "cstyp_NO" ,"cstyp_"."SubledgerDescrption" "cstyp_SubledgerDescrption" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."CSMSUP_NO" "CSMSUP_NO" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."Acc_no" "Acc_no" ,"Acc_"."Acc_Nm" "Acc_Acc_Nm" ,"Acc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Nm" "Acc_Clsacc_Acc_Nm" ,"Acc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Nm" "Acc_Acc_BndAcc_Nm" ,"Acc_Acc_Bndaccclass"."accountclass" "Acc_Acc_Bndaccclassaccountclass" ,"Acc_Acc_BndAcc_Bab"."Acc_Nm" "Acc_Acc_BndAcc_BabAcc_Nm" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."TransactionDetailes" "TransactionDetailes" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."Transactiondate" "Transactiondate" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."Amounttransaction" "Amounttransaction" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."ReferanceNo" "ReferanceNo" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."Referancedate" "Referancedate" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."Companysupplieier" "Companysupplieier" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."glcostcenter1" "glcostcenter1" ,"glcostcenter1"."Costcntr_Nm" "glcostcenter1Costcntr_Nm" ,"glcostcenter1cost_typ"."Costcntr_Nm" "glcostcenter1cost_typCostcntr_Nm" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."glcostcenter" "glcostcenter" ,"glcostcenter"."Costcntr_Nm" "glcostcenterCostcntr_Nm" ,"glcostcentercost_typ"."Costcntr_Nm" "glcostcentercost_typCostcntr_Nm" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."Notes" "Notes" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."ModifiedBy" "ModifiedBy" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."ModifiedOn" "ModifiedOn" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."CreatedBy" "CreatedBy" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."CreatedOn" "CreatedOn" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."ExternalDocFileName" "ExternalDocFileName" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."ExternalDocContentType" "ExternalDocContentType" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."ExternalDocLength" "ExternalDocLength" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."Docezn" "Docezn" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."Docezntype" "Docezntype" ,"BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."CSMSUP_NM" "CSMSUP_NM" from "dbo"."BatchDaileypaymentDetailes" "BatchDaileypaymentDetailes" left join "dbo"."BatchDaileypayment" "TheBatchDaileypayment" on "BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."BatchDaileypayment" = "TheBatchDaileypayment"."BatchDaileypayment" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "TheBatchDaileypaymentacc_" on "TheBatchDaileypayment"."acc_no" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentacc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."GLmfbab" "TheBatchDaileypaymentacc_Clsacc_" on "TheBatchDaileypaymentacc_"."Clsacc_No" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentacc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Bab" left join "dbo"."GLmfband" "TheBatchDaileypaymentacc_Acc_Bnd" on "TheBatchDaileypaymentacc_"."Acc_Bnd" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentacc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Bnd" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "TheBatchDaileypaymentsgm" on "TheBatchDaileypayment"."sgm" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentsgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "TheBatchDaileypaymentsgmOpco" on "TheBatchDaileypaymentsgm"."OpcoID" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentsgmOpco"."OpcoIDidentity" left join "dbo"."GLSubledgertyplist" "TheBatchDaileypaymentcstyp_" on "TheBatchDaileypayment"."cstyp_NO" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentcstyp_"."Subledgerid" left join "dbo"."Pymntype" "TheBatchDaileypaymentPymnt_" on "TheBatchDaileypayment"."Pymnt_No" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentPymnt_"."Pymnt_No" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "TheBatchDaileypaymentPymnt_pymnt_acc" on "TheBatchDaileypaymentPymnt_"."pymnt_acc" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentPymnt_pymnt_acc"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "TheBatchDaileypaymentPymnt_sgm" on "TheBatchDaileypaymentPymnt_"."sgm" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentPymnt_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."schAcademicyear" "TheBatchDaileypaymentacd" on "TheBatchDaileypayment"."acdcode" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentacd"."Code" left join "dbo"."GlFinanceperiod" "TheBatchDaileypaymentacdGlFinperiod" on "TheBatchDaileypaymentacd"."GlFinperiodID" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentacdGlFinperiod"."GlFinperiodID" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranch" on "TheBatchDaileypayment"."branch" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranch"."branch" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchsgm" on "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranch"."sgm" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchsgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchGender" on "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranch"."Genderid" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchGender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."schStage" "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchstage" on "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranch"."stagecode" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchstage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schtyp" "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchschtyp" on "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranch"."schtypid" = "TheBatchDaileypaymentbranchschtyp"."schtypid" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "Thebranch" on "BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."branch" = "Thebranch"."branch" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Thebranchsgm" on "Thebranch"."sgm" = "Thebranchsgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "ThebranchsgmOpco" on "Thebranchsgm"."OpcoID" = "ThebranchsgmOpco"."OpcoIDidentity" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "ThebranchGender" on "Thebranch"."Genderid" = "ThebranchGender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."schStage" "Thebranchstage" on "Thebranch"."stagecode" = "Thebranchstage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schtyp" "Thebranchschtyp" on "Thebranch"."schtypid" = "Thebranchschtyp"."schtypid" left join "dbo"."BatchDaileypaymentitems" "itm" on "BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."itmiD" = "itm"."itmiD" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "itmitmacc_" on "itm"."itmacc_no" = "itmitmacc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."GLmfbab" "itmitmacc_Clsacc_" on "itmitmacc_"."Clsacc_No" = "itmitmacc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Bab" left join "dbo"."GLmfband" "itmitmacc_Acc_Bnd" on "itmitmacc_"."Acc_Bnd" = "itmitmacc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Bnd" left join "dbo"."GLSubledgertyplist" "cstyp_" on "BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."cstyp_NO" = "cstyp_"."Subledgerid" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "Acc_" on "BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."Acc_no" = "Acc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."GLmfbab" "Acc_Clsacc_" on "Acc_"."Clsacc_No" = "Acc_Clsacc_"."Acc_Bab" left join "dbo"."GLmfband" "Acc_Acc_Bnd" on "Acc_"."Acc_Bnd" = "Acc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Bnd" left join "dbo"."accountclasslist" "Acc_Acc_Bndaccclass" on "Acc_Acc_Bnd"."accclass" = "Acc_Acc_Bndaccclass"."accountclassid" left join "dbo"."GLmfbab" "Acc_Acc_BndAcc_Bab" on "Acc_Acc_Bnd"."Acc_Bab" = "Acc_Acc_BndAcc_Bab"."Acc_Bab" left join "dbo"."GLcostcntr1" "glcostcenter1" on "BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."glcostcenter1" = "glcostcenter1"."Costcntr_No" left join "dbo"."Glcostcentgruop1" "glcostcenter1cost_typ" on "glcostcenter1"."cost_typ" = "glcostcenter1cost_typ"."Costcntr_No" left join "dbo"."GLcostcntr" "glcostcenter" on "BatchDaileypaymentDetailes"."glcostcenter" = "glcostcenter"."Costcntr_No" left join "dbo"."Glcostcentgruop" "glcostcentercost_typ" on "glcostcenter"."cost_typ" = "glcostcentercost_typ"."Costcntr_No"
